website_summaries.verdict: A terrific range hood for condos, apartments and other settings where space is limited.
pros: Can be installed under a cabinet or against a wall
Unit is 30-inches wide and fits perfectly in most kitchens
Offers durable, reusable aluminum mesh filters to trap grease and oil
cons: Provides limited suction in comparison to similar units

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit. It moves more air than other models ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. It moves more air than other models I looked at. The underside is enclosed so you can't see up inside of it. It came with a non removable cord and my old unit was hard wired so I had to put an electrical outlet in the cabinet above (very inconvenient). The lights are in the very back and not really over the main cooking area. It looks good and is a huge improvement over the broken one it replaced. lastly the instructions said to mount it 25 inches above the stove. I put it where the old one was at 19 inches.
customer_reviews.author: david wilson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, high performance and a LOOKER!!!
customer_reviews.text: We finally got the opportunity to replace our stove and vent hood after our recent kitchen remodel and we chose the Cosmo 30 in 200 CFM under cabinet vent hood. This hood met all of our checkpoints for a new vented hood! It was inexpensive, it had 3 fan speeds, was quiet, had 2 light bulbs for superior stovetop lighting, and was available in stainless steel. It got installed last night and we LOVE it!! I have to say...the new stove and vent hood look downright SEXY!!!! I highly recommend choosing this model when you upgrade your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Carol P. N.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: COSMO range hood installed early June 2018. Used 3 times. The fourth time, August 26, 2018, it was used on the low setting. After about 30 minutes, the motor flashed, smoked a bit, and stopped working. Light still works, but nothing else. Of course, given the very short time window to register this product for warranty, there is no effective warranty or remedy. Potential purchasers should be aware of the quality of this product and the warranty issues.
customer_reviews.author: LRHPOSSLQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, need to replace lights with bright one's though
customer_reviews.text: Sleek look, nice upgrade from my old unit but nicked a star due to lighting. The lights are located at the rear of the unit (instead of middle or front) and they are not really bright enough to be effective. I purchased 2 E17 LED (60W equivalent) and that made it acceptable. I also put shiny tin foil over the top to mirror the light a bit more which helps. Update: The fan stopped working after 7 months. I called Customer support and they were great: They troubleshooted the issue and will mail me out replacement parts for free. Assuming that resolves, I will maintain 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BimmerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Form and function!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase. We were trying to do as much to the kitchen and remain within our budget, this hood helped achieve that. The install process was very seamless, probably the only part of the kitchen reno that was ;) Personally, I feel the light is a little too bright-white, I might look into changing the bulb for something a little warmer. Otherwise, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Redmond

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is loud with very little suction power. I actually thought we installed it incorrectly and contacted customer service. The representative I spoke to was really helpful, but he explained that the hood was meant for a “small apartment” and would not be enough for “a family of four”. I would buy a more powerful one, but I don’t have space for a larger profile hood. I’m not trying to cook Thanksgiving dinner here, just stream some rice and boil some frozen corn... sadly it’s now just another surface I need to clean. If we uninstall the hood, I’ll be left with massive holes through my backsplash. So I guess I’m stuck with it...
customer_reviews.author: Susan O

customer_reviews.title: This hood has nice features. I lov the LED light and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This hood has nice features. I lov the LED light and the number of fan speed choices. It would have been easily done to provide an option for rectangle in addition to the circular. My duct to the outside is rectangular and we had to make some modifications to duct in the wall. I was dismayed to notice after we finished the installation that there was a small dent right in the front center. I recommend you look over the casing carefully before getting it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great once installed.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Airflow is significantly less when recirculating than exhausting (which can be expected). The screw pattern forces screwing into the middle bottom of the upper cabinet, so beware if you have thin bottoms on your cabinets. Some of the screw holes are also situated in an area that makes it difficult to reach with any tools. Does not come with a charcoal filter. Pros: Much more quiet than our old Bosch. Great LED lighting. Metal filters are simple to install and remove. It looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: titlehere

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this hood exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.text: My old exhaust fan was more than 30 years old. When I tried to use it, it took several minutes to warm up then it made loud metallic grinding sounds. It was past time to replace it. I am nit a do it yourself kind if woman so I paid my handyman to install it. He had to go into the attic to make sure the exhaust hose was vented to the outside rather than directly to the attic. The fan has three speeds, none of which are silent. The increasing speed is accompanied by an increasing noise level. While the noise of the fan is noticeable it is tolerable. I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Beguiling

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant with twins unable to cook
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this fan August 2019. 14 June 2020 it sounded like it was going to explode and stopped working. The customer service is so slow and instead of sending me a new unit to exchange, all they would agree to was to send me a new motor assembly. I'm not an electrician. I'm a pregnant mom who hasn't been able to cook safely on my gas stove now for over a month. It's the 16th of July and I still haven't gotten the replacement part. Don't trust your household welfare to this company.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish look
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this tonight and the template that they gave didn’t quite put the 4 screws in the correct places so if we were to install it again I would drill the hole for the cord get it where you want and then have someone mark the 4 screw holes and then drill them. Other then that the install went fine into our upper cabinet. The fan is a bit loud on high and I haven’t tried the suction yet but it puts light on the back of the stove where we mostly cook and I find it’s bright enough. We are happy with the look of the new range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten L-H

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommended it — Do Not buy it
customer_reviews.text: First, I don’t recommend this product for following reasons: - sucking power is weak - the duct size is 4,5” not 5” as advertised, it’s not standard. - the light is very dim I would recommend it for the following reasons - cheap - look nice My final verdict: I don’t recommend it at all because cons is more than pros, especially the duct size is not standard 5”. This is not good engineering at all.
customer_reviews.author: Red Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, but...
customer_reviews.text: ....I really wanted it to perform as well as it looks. We chose this range hood originally for its slim, modern design, and its ventless option - to put over our 3-year-old glass cooktop range. We also relied on its 4.5 star ratings. The install was simple and the range hood LOOKS great. But its looks and its operation don't match. It has 3 fan speeds that are loud, Louder, and REALLY LOUD - none of which draw well in its ventless mode. Also, the rear-installed 1" x 4" LED light is not well placed, and not very effective for seeing what you're doing. If we end up replacing this, we'll try them out first - in person.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Hood, New LED Bulbs Difficult to Replace
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, effective, affordable, and reasonably straightforward to install. As other reviews have mentioned, the stock bulbs are a hideously cold, stark white. But more importantly, they seem to have changed the bulbs. Previous reviews claimed that the bulbs could be easily unscrewed and swapped out like any old light bulb. The one I received (newer version?) contains surface mounted (SMD) LED bulbs -- in other words, they're soldered to a PCB Circuit Board. Only someone comfortable soldering electronic circuit boards will be able to replace these bulbs with a warmer alternative, or eventually put in new ones when they expire in 10+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie Grayne

customer_reviews.title: 36-inch is the perfect size for the missus (What she said!)
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 36-inch version used through the Amazon Warehouse. It was priced half off and supposedly in a banged up condition, but when we received it, everything was still in original condition. The packagin was damaged, and there was a very minor dent on the top where no one would ever see once installed. Speaking of which, installation was a breeze, and the overall look fit our needs for the moment. The fans work great in sucking out air. They are not that loud to me, at least not much louder than what we originally had. Overall, a great buy even if we were to pay at brand new price.
customer_reviews.author: MarJan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value but loud.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size and profile, doesn't overpower the setting and mounts easily. The operating buttons on the front are not distracting and are self explanatory. It works extremely well, make sure to order the required filter also. Some things to consider: LED light is set in the back of the unit so it is slightly glaring while cooking if you are under 5'7" and the fan is loud as hell. Like, good grief, it sounds like my mom's from the 70's. I had no idea how annoying this was going to be, and I'm going to avoid using it if truth be told.
customer_reviews.author: Annemieke P.

customer_reviews.title: Good economy model range hood
customer_reviews.text: Install was a bit of a hassle and required a bit of modification to my fixtures. Fans are quiet, compared to my last range hood. They move a decent amount of air, but nothing too exciting. I highly recommend replacing the LED bulbs - it looks better with daylight or soft white. It would also be better if the lights were towards the front of the unit instead of the back. It looks nice, however, this thing is a fingerprint magnet. Compared to my other stainless appliances, it seems like I have to wipe this thing down every time I walk past it.
customer_reviews.author: Sevro au Barca

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT, Good "BANG for the BUCKS"
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is the perfect compliment for my black/stainless range. High quality, fine craftsmanship and it IS CONVERTIBLE from "ducted" to "ductless" with the adapters INCLUDED in the packaging. No extra's to buy for the conversion - just twist 'em in. The 2 screens are easily removed for cleaning, the 2 LED lights give it just the right amount of illumination and they give it that "high end" look. Excellent valve for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Older then Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleekness of this hood. I have had it in place since the Oct. 11. I'm not sure if I will keep it because there seems to be an intermittent loud rattle to it. Still unsure because I don't cook everyday. Pros: Not bulky Looks great Easy to work/cook beneath Great price Cons: The material used for this should be called "stainfull" instead of "stainless" - you will know everytime you have touched it. The vent is loud on the mid and highest settings If, at any point, I have to purchase another, I will demo it in a offline store to test the finish and loudness.
customer_reviews.author: Tacha Coleman Parr

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This unit was listed at like new in original box. Box damaged...well, so was the unit. Dent in the top is not visible but the scrape in the front is and I didn't notice it until it was installed. Wrote asking for help with wiring and didn't hear anything so had to make it up as I went along. Was concerned about the rear lighting and it is unusable! I'm not on my third set of replacement light bulbs but they are barely serviceable. The fan does work really well and the filters are easy to remove for washing. All in all, I'm disappointed and feeling like I'll be removing it and finding a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Prochazka

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo 5MU30 ductless range hood
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an over-the-range microwave which also had a ductless vent fan. Did not use the mounting template or included hardware. Needed to use other screws that I had on hand, but the mounting was simple with only four mounting holes. Did need an extra pair of hands to hold it in place during installation. The hood is quite attractive, does not look cheap and appears well made. This vent is a bit noisy but what I expected for a non vented fan. Suction appears adequate. I'm not sure if the added charcoal filter is making much difference in odor removal during cooking. Overall I am pleased with this range hood. A bargain at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: KarenL

customer_reviews.title: Range-Hood great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and clean looking, I love the sleek design, the LED Lighting is superb and a very clean design, I love the three filter design on this Cosmo 36” model although there is a little gap between the three filters and body of unit, all gap totals 3/16th of an inch so I filled the gap with thin cardboard strips, 4 each strips total, if the back outlet is used like I did, the damper won’t work but that’s ok because I will put a new wall cap with damper and screen outside, other than that all is as advertised, much better than what we had.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: A bit short of 36 inches
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my kitchen for our major remodel. It looks good and works. It's medium loud, has three fan speeds, and comes with LED bulbs. This model is to be ducted out of the house, which is more work but very much preferred to just a carcoal filter system. My two complaints would be the bulbs that come in it are not very bright (I'm going to buy some brighter ones) and it is about 1/2 inch short of 36 inches. So I filled the quarter inch gap on each side with some trim from the cabinet company.
customer_reviews.author: MDJ

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek looking, but has a dim light.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. My old hood was hard wired so I just looked off the cord plug and wired it in. Exhaust is a 4.5 inch round on the back or top. In my case it exits the wall. I found a round to rectangle conversion adapter for my vent, also on Amazon. Noise level is low compared to my old hood and I love the grease traps completely cover the hood entrance. This should be a snap to keep clean. Only negative is the weak LED light. It has a sickly pale white hue to it. So I have ordered some additional lighting to light the cooking area.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It Sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products, like a vacuum cleaner, the more it "sucks" the better it is. lol! Seriously though, it has been installed for several weeks and it works great. The smoke detectors would sound off weekly before the new fan install. Not at all now. It looks nice and my wife loves the stove light. She likes to get up early with only minimum light in the kitchen to begin her daily prayers. I would not hesitate to buy Cosmo products again. Thanks! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek/clean/modern
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond thrilled with this vent hood! It looks beautiful installed. No tacky labels or old switches! It’s much more bright than my old vent.. and I love that the filters span the entire width! I installed it to vent inside.. but I’m glad it has the potential to be switched to vent outdoors. I was able to install it myself in about an hour. I love that the top is completely smooth... it’s much easier to wipe down. Given a choice, I would def purchase this again! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Leesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking range hood at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The Cosmo Under Cabinet Range Hood in Stainless Steel with 200 CFM (30 inches) is an attractive addition to my kitchen. I bought a new stainless stove and the white hood I had just didn't work. The install was slow as I was learning as I went and had to slightly modify the installation location, but it's in now and with the new stainless backsplash my kitchen went from plain to quite nice looking. The supplied anchors were for 1/2" drywall and the bottoms of my cabinets had 3/8", but a quick trip to the hardware store remedied that. The fan is definitely quieter than that on the old hood.
customer_reviews.author: NevadaWilds

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our rental unit. It's very nice looking and I think puts out a nice mood-ish light. It's not super bright at all. The fan is a little more noisy than I'd like on all 3 settings. Hasn't been used in cooking yet so I can't report on that but if the feel of the fan(hand underneath) is any indication, I'm thinking it will work well. Also, a breeze to install but if you don't have an outlet ready, you'll need an electrician needless to say.
customer_reviews.author: Basia B

customer_reviews.title: Problems Months In
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to contact the company, but will do so. I noticed something hanging down from the screen. It was some kind of plastic material that was melting from a wire behind the screen and going through the screen and dripping onto my stove and pot of food. It melted on my stove, marking my stove and required peeling it off. I see a slight ring on my stovetop still. I paid someone to install this, so that was a waste of my money since I will need another one. I'm more worried about it damaging my stove or getting into our food.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: It'll do!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this range hood to replace a vent in the ceiling which was installed upon the building of the home in the last 1950's or early 1960's. It's not a quiet as I'd like or as it said in the description: "POWERFUL YET QUIET: 200 CFM, 3 speed motor, 56dB max.", IT IS NOT QUIET. the lowest speed is the quietest, but not that quiet! But hopefully it'll do the job it's meant to do! I haven't actually used it yet, as it's just been installed, but later I'll use it and update my ratings if need be!
customer_reviews.author: P. Senecal

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit, but needs to include a vent kit or better instructions...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit, but needs to include an outdoor exhaust vent kit, or at least more instructions on that part. Went to my local True Value and local hardware store and they did not stock a 5" metal duct pipe or outside vent cover with butterfly to prevent back drafts back into the home. Also no screws for securing the unit to the upper cabinet, only for drywall. I ran an outdoor exhaust straight out the back of the unit. No instructions in the directions on how to do this. Nice looking unit and seems to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ductless Hood Range
customer_reviews.text: It is a good Ductless Hood Range. Make sure you order the Carbon Filters. I would have given the Hood a 5 but the wall anchors were very cheap and not effective for drywall. It was very easy to install but I recommend that you have two people. Also make note that this unit has a standard 3 pronged plug. If you are replacing and older unit, It may only have a wire connection into the wall. In this case you may have to have a outlet installed.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great value for performance
customer_reviews.text: Install of this hood took about 30-45 min and I did it by myself. Although I’d recommend installing with a second person, unless you get creative... I am very happy with the noise level on high when compared to my old hoods I’ve had. It could be quieter, but you’d jump tremendously in price if you wanted to do that. Looks fantastic and the buttons add a nice touch and are easy to use. The light is a very nice led and a huge upgrade from standard bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Courson

customer_reviews.title: Wiring.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. It is noisier than expected. The part I didn't like was the wiring. It did advertise it was corded. In my application to plug it into a outlet would make it impossible to put the unit against the wall. It would stick out about 1 1/2 in. from the wall. With no were to put the cord. I had to cut the cord to hard wire it. Once installed it works very well. I'm saying this to make you aware of this before you buy. It does have a clean look. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: racer

customer_reviews.title: Started making noise in 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. Easy to install but in 2 months of using, it started making noise that was coming from the motor working on high power. I washed the front metal filters every week but still no change. Works good but the noise bothers me a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: SerG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this hood!
customer_reviews.text: This hood is sleek with nice lines. It was easy to install. We have not vented it to the outside yet but it is very functional with just the fan. Our only reservation is the light which is located toward the back and the light bulbs supplied with it do not illuminate our stove top enough. The instructions that came with the vent recommend a limit to the wattage of the bulbs you use which is just not enough light to see the food well as you are cooking. I plan to call the company to see if brighter bulbs are advisable.
customer_reviews.author: pc honey

customer_reviews.title: Better than the competitors at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a 36" unit and happy I found this one. Design is much sleeker than those of the competitors at this price point and even at higher price points. Smooth rounded front instead of the "blocky" squared off units, and an inch or more lower profile is very nice. 3 speed fan instead of 2 and push buttons instead of the dreaded toggle switch. Soft LED could be a bit brighter but not worth complaining about. 3 large filters give a full coverage. Wish it was fingerprint resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Nubbin Ridge Creations, L.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love stainless
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a SS vent hood because the painted ones don't keep their paint for the long haul. When I saw this one I decided to give it a try. The unit is well built, and super easy to install, it gives you the option to vent out the back or top or not vent at all. With the 36 inch it came with a damper (but it will only really work if you vent out the top.) The only real quirk is the push buttons on the front for the speeds and light, but it fits with the retro look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: RovingHogan

customer_reviews.title: Loud fan, 5 inch duct vent.
customer_reviews.text: Minus one star for fan noise. The fan is actually louder at slower speeds. That’s just wrong. Minus another star for installation. The duct vent is 5 inch! Standard 4 inch won’t work. 6 inch won’t work. So what? Duct tape adaptor? Pretty much. Could be just a matter of mistaken Chinese metric conversion. Whatever, not good! The best part of this unit is the price.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Skalecki

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleek, modern look of this over the range hood. I purchased this 36" hood to fit on my vintage 1950s cabinets. The instructions that came with this product were clear and easy to understand. Installation took two people. Even at its highest setting, the fan is relatively quiet. The suction isn't as strong as I'd like, but it gets the job done. The filters are VERY easy to remove and clean - a definite plus. Overall I'm extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Lights are 3 watt bulbs and in back of unit....why?
customer_reviews.text: This unit is 30" and that is the ONLY thing that I like about it. The vent is round without any punch out for rectangular. The fan feels like it's barely sucking anything and the lights are way in the back...why? In any case you get what you pay for with this unit. It's stainless steel and that is all I can say about it. Not even sure if it's worth sending back
customer_reviews.author: snnoopy

customer_reviews.title: The 36 in cosmo comes with 3 grills and a caron filter can be added.
customer_reviews.text: The good is the Cosmo 36 inches in length and fit perfectly on my 30 inch Samsung stovetop kitchen. I previous had purchased the 30 inch Cosmo30 but it looked small. The 36 has a better fit. The suction fan sounds like a restroom suction fan not too noisy. The 36 Cosmo has 3 grills not 2 like some of the model appeared. Finger print easy stay on the unit when touched by I am able to clean them easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Olivas-Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this product because the vent pipe was round and the existing pipe in my house turned out to be rectangular, but from what I can review it was well made and well packaged. I did think however, the instructions were written for the professional and not the average household dummy like me. I was able to figure it out for myself. A template was included to drill the holes, which was nice. Would certainly purchase again, although after I checked the existing structure.
customer_reviews.author: JackieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal filter doesnt come with it but works as described
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that you have to still buy the charcoal internal filter that was not highlighted in the description! After I received it I had then purchase the charcoal filter! Other than then it works as described and easy to install as it omes with templates to assure you get the screws and draft hole in the right places!! It would be 5 stars if it it either came complete to work out of box or at least highlighted for easy to see in the description
customer_reviews.author: B. G.

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T INCLUDE WHAT IT STATES IT DOES
customer_reviews.text: Does not come wit vent hole port caps on back nor front as shown on amazon page now can’t cap off hole that won’t be used. On amazon page says, “ INCLUDES INSTALLATION KIT: Backdraft damper, mounting kit & manual. For Ductless Install, Purchase Carbon Filter Kit (Part #CFK4)” THATS A LIE DOES NOT COME WITH ANYTHING EXCEPT EXTRACTOR..not even the manual. PATHETIC don’t waste money on this now have to spend more money to get what I didn’t get with this
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Designed to prevent installation.  Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: This hood is impossible to design. The light is in a rear ledge. That ledge is directly below the two rear screw holes. This means that you cannot get a drill into the holes to predrill for the wood screws included. Nor can you get a screw driver on the screws. You can try to angle the screws at about 45 degrees to work around the ledge, but then the screws to not reach the cabinet. Incredibly poor design. Amazon should be ashamed to have this for sale.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roddewig

customer_reviews.title: My time is worth more than this. Probably want to shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Used in private home. Delivery was slow and blamed on covid 19. Fit and finish is good but they hold back critical parts, which they offer for free, until you write a review on Amazon. Then you have to collect multiple Id and codes from about a dozen places to actually fill out the form. I expect they will reject one of the id numbers or this review. Not sure why they just can't say "If you like our product please review on Amazon."
customer_reviews.author: Paul W Helmer

customer_reviews.title: The light is useless. Fan OK.  4 start because you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights are only good as a night light. Too weak to cook by. I had to buy an under cabinet light bar to make the stove top bright enough to work. The light is also a bright (cool) white, so if you like a warm, incandescent light, look elsewhere. Installation was easy because the wall behind the unit was open. I drilled my own holes in the unit so I could mount to the studs. But that would have been needed with any fan I had purchased. Waiting on the filter to arrive (installed ductless) so I'll have to update later on the fan once I get the filter installed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Easier to buy online
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new range hood, but I was having little success finding what I needed at a brick-and-motor store. So, I decided to search the Internet and found just what I was looking for, the Cosmo 5MU30 range hood. The documentation described the range hood perfectly. The unit arrived quickly and, I had no problems assembling and installing it. The only quirky thing is that installation instructions recommend a 5 inch vent, but it the unit comes with a 4 and a half inch vent. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for a nice looking hood vent! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the three speed fan. Suction power has not been tested long enough to know if it earns five stars. Looks great. Works great. I used ducted installation. Make sure you read the instructions because it takes a 5” duct (this one did anyway). Duct attachment is three ear tabs and doesn’t tighten or stop, it free spins. I didn’t like this design but it works great. Great value. I never do reviews or pics but it came with an offer for free items if I posted pics with my review.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleek design and led light
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought stainless steel appliances and needed a new hood vent. I chose the Cosmo after reading the reviews and I’m very happy with it. I love the sleek design and led light. This hood vent does come with a plug in cord which is handy if you have a plug in your cabinet my husband had to add a outlet to mine. Also, if using ductless you need to purchase the carbon filters separately.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: the LED lamps are perfect for what I use it for which is subdued ...
customer_reviews.text: This hood is outstanding, the LED lamps are perfect for what I use it for which is subdued lighting or night light for kitchen. The full bottom grease screens are the best idea I have seen. The blower is quieter than my old microwave range hood in my last house. The quality and finish of this hood is spectacular. It enhances my major kitchen remodel. Highly recommend this hood, price, quality, and installation are a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Hood only suitable for light cooking...
customer_reviews.text: The hood is awesome looking. Incredible affordable. It's super easy to install and lightweight. However, about 20 minutes into the first use, as we cooked dinner, the hood shut itself off! It was probably the amount of fumes and heat we were generating - the stove's 4 burners were all on. Anyhow, it came back on after about 30 minutes, but by that time, we had already completed cooking and our home smelled like we had hotboxed ourselves while cooking. We immediately returned the hood. Amazon return was amazingly fast. However... wasted my time installing/uninstalling.
customer_reviews.author: iRenaissanceMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice hood fan
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this hood fan. It was quite difficult to install. My opening is 36” and it doesn’t quite fit. I Had to cut off the plug and splice the wire so I could hardwire it as it would not have worked otherwise. Also has to purchase an adapter so the hole would into the vent and then had to cut that metal so the wires would be hidden. The lighting is not as bright as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a DIY type of person at all. But after reading some reviews, I felt comfortable enough to try to install it myself. Even for a below-average DIY person like me, it was simple enough to install. What helps is that this unit is very light. Overall, it is a very quality product and recommends for a below-average DIY person like me. It looks very nice and pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great. Be advised, it sticks way out more than the cheaper ones which is fine except my husband keeps hitting his head on it and for that reason alone we might have to get a smaller, cheaper one. I don't want to, so am stalling on it. He will have to learn how to avoid the thing is all. Sorry about tilted photo, no edit available.
customer_reviews.author: Booklearner

customer_reviews.title: Smartens Up Our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: After a fair bit of research, we decided on the Cosmo 5MU30 to replace a hood that was twenty-seven years old. The Cosmo 5MU30 arrived extremely well packaged. There were no dents or scratches on the product. Installation was straightforward and without incident. Once the Cosmo was up and running, we tested all the fan speeds and the hood’s LED lights, which are sufficiently bright for our needs. For its reasonable price, we are more than satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PGN

customer_reviews.title: Slim, and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an overhead fan with light that was not huge, and didn't create a focal point within the kitchen. This does it. Fan and light works great. 3 different fan speeds, with the highest being somewhat loud, but it needs to do its job so is expected. I like the placement of the light at the back, so it actually lights up the back burners.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made.  Easy access everything, filters are a great design!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I really like this design. I’m a mechanical engineer so I’m a bit picky. Pros: Filters WILL stay in, and are super easy to remove Powerful fan Bulbs easy to change Relay board should last a while Survived a 4 foot drop onto concrete Cons: Installation involved quite a few swear words Provided lights are dim but also too white and hurt eyes.
customer_reviews.author: James McClaren

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Very good item for the money, compared to everything else ranging from $200-800. The light is bright, the fan is powerful, and the design looks awesome. The only thing bad with this is the 5 inch exhaust it comes with doesn't fit standard 5 inch venting, but with a little cutting and a bit of metal tape it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dyl Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and nice looking vent hood
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vent hood to replace an old Broan range hood. Compare to Broan, this is a much better looking range hood, like others mentioned, this have a "professional" look to it. It is very easy to install, couple screws, plug in the outlet and that's it. The build in LED light is nice, but it is little dimmer than I would like. If there is a improvement I could suggest, it will be replaced this with a more powerful LEDs. The suction power is decent, will have to judge after I have the chance to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T.

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo 36in exhaust hood .duct system is used
customer_reviews.text: I received the product with a dented box on the right corner maybe it's the usps guy who delivered my item but the product itself is in good condition because it was packed securely from the inside. I received it this afternoon and install it for 30 min including the removal of my old microwave over the range. Rated it 5 because of it's price the hood is still good looking, function is good and the fan is quite. I'll update my review again if something comes up wrong but for now all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Boeing

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions and follow them and should work great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. It looks great! We haven’t installed it yet, but have plugged it in and tried everything. So for I’m happy with it. Will be using it ductless, so I put in the charcoal filter (purchased separately) and unscrewed and moved the little lever that’s near the top of the fan on right hand side, to the right, and you can fill air coming out the front vent. I think it will be just what we need for our small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product easy install by myself but get help if you can. Works well for 200cfm wish it would have come with charcoal filter that’s another $18.00. The only thing I didn’t like was that when the light was on I could see light leaking at the seems and folds, so I took some aluminum faced duct tape and taped the seems from the inside, no more light leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL RANGE HOOD
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to get my range hood in one day. I removed it from the box and it looks better than the picture. I haven’t installed it yet but I’m very pleased with the sleekness of the design. It doesn’t look cheap. It looks like a high quality item. So far I’m very pleased with how it looks and how fast I received it. I can’t state anything negative because I haven’t installed it yet. Will do another review when it’s installed very soon.
customer_reviews.author: micki

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the Range Hood we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to find the perfect Range Hood for our kitchen remodel. The Cosmo had the perfect features we were looking for. Clean, sleek, modern. It needed to be Ductless as our kitchen does not have a vent. We needed an undermount for our custom install. All of these features are included. I ordered the charcoal filter that the company clearly said we would need for ductless. As soon as the vent arrived I inspected it for damage (none) and fit. It fit perfectly and installation is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J Turner

customer_reviews.title: Quiet with great illumination
customer_reviews.text: This under cabinet range hood is fairly easy to install and has a slim, contemporary profile. It's quiet and moves air efficiently in the recirculate function with the carbon filter. We really like the great illumination over the cooktop. The rear screw holes for cabinet attachment are not accessible straight up- you have to angle the screws in due to the design. It still rates a 5 star from us!!
customer_reviews.author: RunningManBill

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine and easy to install, but had to return after 2 days of use, charcoal filters kept falling down when machine was running. I made sure it was install right and even their customer service from Cosmo, which are very nice people helped me out, but it didn’t work and kept falling. One thing I love about the range hood was very sleek and mesh filters easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Regino Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a great value and works amazingly well! Noise level is better than most and the the ease of installation was great! The suction power of the fan is adequate (but we wish it was a little more) and the lights are great! We have it installed over a slide in range and the lighting is well above average! We would buy again ... but I think this one will be around for a long time! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I just installed ours and looks good, overall is an OK unit. The filtration system seems better than average since it requires a carbon filter for vent-less installation and the regular filters are bigger. The switch feels good for a $100.00 unit. The fingerprints will show real easy. Packaging is appropriate and in my case there were no dents. I would not recommend this unit until those issues are worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: It is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical on a non traditional known brand for appliances. The product came nicely packed. Instruction is clear and easy to install. Noise is acceptable on the low and medium, but the high is bit high than I expected and compared to other. One of the key reasons to pick this hood, other than its appearance is no digital display and the filters are easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. It was a breeze to install. We replaced an old Broan fan and this is a big improvement. The three-speed fan is nice and the operation is really quiet. The three aluminum filters are easy to remove for cleaning. It comes with 2 LED lamps but the only drawback was the low wattage and lumens of the bulbs. It comes with two 3 watt, 250-lumen bulbs which are a little weak if you're looking for lighting in a darker kitchen. We replaced them with 5 watt, 500-lumen bulbs and that really helped. It's a quality product and we're veryy happy we chose it
customer_reviews.author: Tim H

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and pushes air at 3 speeds
customer_reviews.text: I love the rounded front and the stainless steel buttons on the front. I love that there is no logo on it. I love how easy it was to install and the easy to follow instructions. I loved the price!! It makes my kitchen look so good now. It works great. Love the three speeds on the fan. It really pushes the air. Nice bright LED lights . No longer have the hot lights like my old range hood. This will be a great accent to my new Stainless stove that I am anxiously awaiting to be delivered. Caution: Wear gloves while handling and installing, as there are some sharp edges around the vent holes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Leffel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Cosmo hood was very easy to install. I was going to get someone to install it professionally, but my husband said he would install it. He installed it, and it looks great. It works perfectly. It's very quiet and the lights shine very bright. Great product for the price. I will buy Cosmo products again, in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elien

customer_reviews.title: The range hood does NOT come with carbon filter for ductless use.
customer_reviews.text: The range hood looks fantastic and seems to work so far but I was very disappointed to find that it doesn't come with the carbon filter that's needed when you use it on recirculating mode. We liked the fact that it came with templates for mounting. The directions were fairly easy to follow and there's really nothing to the assembly. I was really hoping that it would be quieter than my older range hood. Unfortunately, it's not any quieter at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good size, seems to be quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and modern look. Good size, seems to be quality construction. LED is very bright (1 complaint though, see below). My only complaints - 1. The LED light is very far back and most of the illumination occurs on the back wall / stove, not really over the cooking area. Would be cool if the light was movable.See below (ignore missing backsplash - mid renovation) 2. It could use a template for making pilot holes (both duct and screws). I made one using the cardboard box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: lililililil

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and affordable, but the lighting is inadequate
customer_reviews.text: The hood is attractive enough and priced affordably. The light, however, is totally inadequate, a narrow strip on the the back of the hood; it casts a weak light hts on the back of the stove and backsplash, but sheds little light on the burners. Not a good choice if cooking is your passion.
customer_reviews.author: Dena M Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Really really REALLY poor light.
customer_reviews.text: Awful lighting. My cell phone screen (not flashlight) puts out more light ....when set to dim. Really awful. If you expect to use this lighting for anything, but something else. If I didn't spend three hours installing it, I'd sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be like commercial grade very good looking range hood
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful and my kitchen and living room are no longer smoked out. I highly would recommend this product the price is right! The lights work great and evenly light up my entire stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish /Sleek ...A winner
customer_reviews.text: This hood is a total upgrade for my kitchen. I have been upgrading my galley kitchen for a year and this was such a value. The fan is strong and the overall look of it is very modern...I can not wait to add the slate back splash . For the quality, function and money. This is a winner. Installation was a little tricky and you will need at least 2 people for the install Totally worth it. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud fan buttons, not much light. Fan itself not too loud. Pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Just had it installed. Very pretty but not much light. Light strip runs parallel to wall at very back of hood and while the hood is flush to the wall my range is not so the light isn’t over the burners at all. And only one setting for lights. Buttons for fan are VERY loud. I have to hold my finger over the one that is depressed when I press a different speed to slow it’s extrusion and thus muffle the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Ease of Installation
customer_reviews.text: The wife says we need a new oven vent and wants it installed before Thanksgiving, she apparently forgot it was hunting season. She picked out the Cosmo unit and with Amazon efficiency it arrived the next day. Instructions and templates made it a breeze to install and meet the Thanksgiving deadline. Built solid, bright light and the three speed fan is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: CSM7USA

customer_reviews.title: Landlord Special
customer_reviews.text: Suction is poor, motor is inefficient to move air well. Light fixture in unit is useless and best used as a night light. Easy install. Bought cheap and got cheap. Best as a unit for a rental property. Three speed fan with increasing noise levels as you go up in speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McGinn

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: This range hood looks so good! It was so easy to install with the paper template included. Just four screws, plug it in, and go. I love that the filters are metal and not plastic. Looks sleek and clean. We are using it non-vented, with recirculating air and the carbon filter. The carbon filter was a bit hard to attach.
customer_reviews.author: POLE1944

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean design and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: The lighting placement on this unit is at the back and of minimal value lighting the cooking surface of our range. Replacing the factory bulbs with higher power bulbs helps even though the manual indicates bulbs should not exceed the installed wattage. The fan operates on three speeds all of which seem excessively noisy.
customer_reviews.author: John Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solid product that delivers!
customer_reviews.text: Searching for a quality hood fan that sucks lots of air, fits my space and has nice LED lights I found this one. It was NOT available everywhere, but Amazon came to the rescue! This unit came as promised and was an easy install as it is a solid quality product. Having the AC connection via 110 plug gave me a little more work, but a cleaner and safer install. I'm very happy with this product as it sucks GREAT, Looks Great, and illuminates great!
customer_reviews.author: CShannon1077

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: It is very noisy and at the top speed it vibrates a lot. When I received it I realized it was not some I could install myself. So I had it professionally done. I had installer check it Again because of it vibrating he said it was the Unit. While I cook everything for scratch I only do this for myself and one other person so I can live with it. If You have large family or use your hood a lot I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We did not have the option to have a outside ducted range hood installation. This range hood with the addition of the charcoal filter was the perfect fit for us. Our installation was under a cabinet. The range hood is light weight and therefor I was able to install it without an additional set of hands. I wish the light was brighter. It's OK for lighting up the cooking surface, but not was well as I had hoped. We had a similar range hood in another house. The lights were in the front, which seemed to do a better job of lighting the cooking surface. For the price and ease of installation I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Campany

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain range hood.  Quite happy.
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy based on price, as I didn't even expect that a ductless range hood could help out my sometimes smoky kitchen. But combined with the charcoal filter, it does a really good job and keeps my cabinets a bit cleaner as well. Very easy to mount with both wall and cabinet holes pre-drilled. Not very noisy either. For the money nothing was even close...
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Slim and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Slimline, easy to install, and I love that the light is in the back so it is not bright right over my head. First one had a small dent in the front, but they immediately shipped another. Second one perfect! Just the simple, low profile hood I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good hood for the price
customer_reviews.text: This 30 inch hood is a good quality hood for the price. This hood works well and is quiet even when it is on high. The LED lights give excellent lighting. If there is one item that needs to be looked into is that there was now way to wire the hood directly, so you have to cut the cord end to wire the hood.
customer_reviews.author: William O. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Requires AC power socket
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy enough if you have a power socket for the cord. My previous installation was direct-wired so I had to re-work that to make it work. Would be better with the option to install either way. Additional lights on the front edge would be an improvement I would pay a little more for. Otherwise it sucks good, is fairly quiet, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hale

customer_reviews.title: good looking design and features
customer_reviews.text: I am currently remodeling my kitchen. When I received the shipping package, it comes with a pretty good package cover. My wife and I like the slim design with stainless color. We looked for a stainless range hood, and most of them are over $150. I think this is the best price compared to other brands. This model has three fan speed settings and a daylight bulb; low and medium fan speeds seem weak, but strong speed is enough to absorb smogs from cooking. The material is lightweight, so I only three 4 screws on the top.
customer_reviews.author: sim

customer_reviews.title: A Jewel in design
customer_reviews.text: Today i received my COSMO -5MU36.What a wonderful designed Under Cabinet Range Hood. The mounting took me only 25 min. It is a lot quieter as my old hood. And the LED lights are a lot better than my old lights. My friend liked it so much she is ready to order one because she could not believe the prize on AMAZON. We also liked that the underside has the big screens and you can not look inside.
customer_reviews.author: posydon

customer_reviews.title: This system is EXACTLY as described.
customer_reviews.text: I found this Range hood fairly easy to install and exactly as described. I have had it for a year now and so far I have not experienced any issues what so ever. The suction motors are still just as quiet as the day I got them and the light just a bright. What you see is what you get!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tydlacka

customer_reviews.title: good unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily. High quality stainless. Fan is not quiet but not bad, remove and clean filters easily. Note that lighting color is very cool and bluish! It shines off toward the back wall which I like and is plenty bright but not overwhelming. I think it's a nice unit for the money! - We've used it for two months so far and like it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome in my new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone we are renovating an older home and I was looking for a new over the stoce fan. I didnt want the same old same old and i dont have enogh room for a microwave because I didnt want to put the 12 in cabinet above the stove i wanted the functional 18 in which left me very little room. the cosmo fan is perfect. see my picture. Love it cery rish a beautiful looking and I love the fact a charcol filter can me installed. the other feature is the double fan filters are easy to take out and washable. very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stainless low cost option
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it looks great and went up relatively easy. We had to add a power plug which got a little tricky in our 100 year old house but it was doable. The fan on med or high is really loud and we would prefer the light to be closer to the front but again, you can not beat the price. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: caty d

customer_reviews.title: slim and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Took out an older, large range hood and got this one. It's slim, very stylish, and isn't the first thing you see when you look at the range/cabinet. The light is enough, and the "suck" power on low and medium is perfect. High is pretty powerful, but also pretty loud for me. Filters are easy to access and change out. Can be vented to the outside or can recirculate air through the filter. We chose the latter--not sure how I'll like it, but I'm sure it can be changed pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: mc2

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: So I wish I knew somewhere on the ordering page that the charcoal filter would be necessary when ordering so that I would’ve gotten both right away instead of unboxing then finding out. The unit fan seems excessively loud but boy is there some suction happening when just testing on a wall outlet for working condition prior to installing. Without having the unit installed until the filter arrives in 2days, overall seems exactly what I was expecting and preparing for . Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: gbpdigger

product_meta.title: Cosmo 5MU30 30 in. Under Cabinet Range Hood with Ducted / Ductless Convertible Duct, Slim Kitchen Stove Vent with, 3 Speed Exhaust Fan, Reusable Filter and LED Lights in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:30 inch| Style:Range HoodCosmo’s COS-5MU30 under cabinet range hood has modern styling for any kitchen decor. Featured in brushed stainless steel, efficient suction removes smells and odors with ease. Two dishwasher-safe aluminum mesh filters collect unwanted grease and oil from the air. Easy push button controls make using our hood easy. Built-in LED lighting ensures visibility for cooking at all times of the day.
feature_bullets: SLIM SPACE SAVING DESIGN: Slim profile saves space. Great for condos and apartments. Convertible to ductless with optional Carbon Filter Kit (Purchase Part # CFK4). Suitable for top or back venting; install under a cabinet or against a wall
EFFICIENT YET QUIET: 3 speed motor, 56dB max. Cosmo’s vent hood filters your kitchen without the loudness and sounds of competing range hoods

SUPERIOR MULTI-LAYER FILTRATION: Durable reusable aluminum mesh filters included to trap grease and oil. Multi-layer filters trap grease more effectively. Uses 5-inch round duct for exhaust vent. HVAC tape required for installation

5 YEAR LIMITED PARTS: Our customer support team is based proudly in the USA. Product Dimensions: 29.75" (W) x 19.75" (L) x 5.5" (H). Electrical Requirements: 120V/60Hz, 3 Prong Plug. Duct Size: 5" Round

specifications.Included Components: Multi-layer Mesh Filters, Backdraft Damper, Light Bulbs, Mounting Kit & Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,127 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
